title: Solomon Islands
summary: Solomon Islands is a country in Melanesia. The capital is Honiara. Population: 750,325. Area: 28,896 kmÂ².

images.alt: The flag of Solomon Islands features a thin yellow diagonal band that extends from the lower hoist-side corner to the upper fly-side corner of the field. Above and beneath this band are a blue and green triangle respectively. Five white five-pointed stars arranged in an X shape are situated on the hoist side of the upper blue triangle.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
